episode.title: ワックへようこそ
Welcome to Wac
Wakku e Youkoso
episode.summary: Tanaka hasn`t really been in a fast food restaurant because he`s not a fan of the fast paced atmosphere. But he tags along with Ohta to WcDonald`s (a.k.a. Wac) so Ohta can try the limited edition sweet. Contrary to Tanaka`s expectations, the service is great and no one cares if he`s being lazy in the restaurant. Delighted by the relaxing atmosphere, Tanaka even starts admiring Wac`s employee. But the employee is frightened at the lazy looking and scary looking high school boys... Source: crunchyroll
